Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extends the authority of the county of Ulster to impose an additional 1 percent sales and compensating use tax
Summary: Extends the authority of the county of Ulster to impose an additional 1 percent sales and compensating use tax by two years.
LawCode: Amd ยง1210, Tax L; amd ยง3, Chap 200 of 2002
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and chapter 200 of the laws of 2002 amending the tax law relating to certain tax rates imposed by the county of Ulster, in relation to extending the authority of the county of Ulster to impose an additional 1 percent sales and compensating use tax
